Detailed Description

template<class KeyType = uint32_t, class ValueType = uint32_t, uint32_t c = 2500000, uint32_t SM_O = 1>
class DynamicPerfectHash< KeyType, ValueType, c, SM_O >

This work is based on Martin's paper 'Dynammic Perfect Hashing: Upper and Lower Bonds' in 1990.

Definition at line 30 of file dynamic_perfect_hash.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

template<class KeyType = uint32_t, class ValueType = uint32_t, uint32_t c = 2500000, uint32_t SM_O = 1>
bool DynamicPerfectHash< KeyType, ValueType, c, SM_O >::rehashAll ( uint64_t  x,
uint64_t  valueIdx 
) [inline, protected]

RehashAll(x) is either called by insert(x) or del(x), and then x=-1. rehashAll(x) build a new table for all elements currently in table.
